APO Trade With Volatility less than 0.5 percent
This test case is used to verfiy the Warning for Oil trades using FEA model. when volatility is less than 0.5 percentage

Steps: 1) Capture a APO trade
2) Verify Warning message from FEA for bad volatility
3) Verify Position Manager
JIRA Ticket - CXL-43559
